name: AuroraX Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Experience unparalleled sound quality with the AuroraX Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones. Designed for music enthusiasts and professionals alike, these headphones feature advanced active noise-cancellation technology, crystal-clear audio, and a battery life of up to 30 hours. The sleek, lightweight design ensures comfort during extended use, making them perfect for travel, work, or leisure.
